duties_responsibilities.duty: Hire and terminate all hourly, non-management crewmembers.
Onboard, process payroll, and manage status changes for hourly crewmembers.
Create work and training schedules for crewmembers.
Manage the performance of hourly crewmembers, including development, coaching, and performance management.
Act as manager on duty and open and close the restaurant.
Manage cash handling and ensure accountability.
Deploy crewmembers during a shift and provide exemplary customer service.
Utilize reward and recognition program for the crewmembers in the restaurant.
Authorize employee functions requiring manager approval.
Ensure cleanliness of the restaurant and facility maintenance.
